FuncDef: The display interface statistics verbose command displays statistics on packets with different lengths sent and received on a specified interface. The display interface statistics verbose command displays statistics on packets with different lengths sent and received on a specified interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
